data.title: Benno J Beck: Who were his parents, full names, date of birth & death.
data.meta_description: Benno J Beck Born Sept 16 1882 Nebraska Died Sept 12 1960 Little Rock California.  Wife:  ...  hand writing from all partys involved were really bad

U S Census, 1900 ED 21 Precinct 11 Omaha city Ward 2, Douglas, Nebraska

https://familysearch.org/pal:/MM9.3.1/TH-267-12389-278534-16?cc=1325221&wc=MMPJ-RMB:1841651209

From the ages of the older children it doesnâ€™t appear that Anna would be their mother, or maybe her dob is recorded incorrectly? Or maybe Christopher and Edith should 1886 and 1887???

head J Alan Beck M 43 July 1857 GER married 15 years immig 1882

wife Anna Beck F 32 Dec 1867 GER immig 1884 8 children 5 living

son Christopher Beck M 24 Apr 1876 NE

dau Edith Beck F 23 Dec 1877 NE

son Otto Beck M 9 Oct 1890 NE

son Berno Beck M 8 Sept 1892 NE

dau Alga Beck F Aug 1895 NE

U S Census, 1910 Lincoln Ward 4, Lancaster, NE

Citing this Record "United States Census, 1910," index and images, FamilySearch (https://familysearch.org/pal:/MM9.1.1/ML4L-628

Herman A Lindner M 30y GER

Christoph Beck M 24y NE (abt 1886)

Arthur Winters M 24y WI

Leonard Lauermann M 31y GER

Benjemen J Beck M 19y NE

This Draft Registration for Otto indicates both parents were still living in 1917 - as he lists himself as their sole support - not listed in Otto's household 1920.
